description: This is the native json number data type

default.description: Default value if this property is omitted

multiple-of.description: This restricts the number to be a multiple of the given number

minimum.description: This provides a lower bound for the restriction

exclusive-minimum.description: If this is true, the value must be greater than minimum. If false or not provided, the value must be greater than or equal to the minimum.

maximum.description: This provides an upper bound for the restriction

exclusive-maximum.description: If this is true, the value must be less than maximum. If false or not provided, the value must be less than or equal to the maximum.
